events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle on May 1st at 7:45 AM.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords found in the report, including car and collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle this particular auto accident claim promptly.
The insurer sent an acknowledgment to the customer confirming receipt of the accident claim and outlining next steps.
The agent requested the customer to submit police reports, photographs of the vehicle damage, and medical reports if any.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including photos of the damaged car and the police collision report.
The claims investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and contacted witnesses to verify the accident details.
Investigation concluded confirming the fault of the other party; no discrepancies found in customer’s report.
A fair settlement amount was proposed covering the vehicle repairs and any medical expenses related to the accident.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the timely updates and the proposed settlement offer for the car accident claim.
The claim was officially approved by the review board after verifying all documents and the settlement proposal.
Insurance payment was issued to the customer’s account to cover the vehicle repairs and associated costs.
The claim was officially closed following payment issuance and confirmation that all customer concerns were addressed.
